item.title: 土耳其通胀意外放缓为大幅降息铺平道路
item.description: 土耳其 11 月份通胀降温幅度超过预期，为央行下周实施更大幅度的降息扫清了道路。【原文：Turkish inflation cooled more than expected in November, clearing a path for the central bank to deliver a more sizable interest-rate cut next week.】

item.title: 英镑上涨，英国富时 100 指数期货持稳
比特币创两周新高，但加密货币情绪依然脆弱
item.description: 比特币周三延续了试探性反弹，创下两周新高，整个加密货币市场正在寻求从长达数周的大跌中持续复苏。【原文：Bitcoin extended a tentative rebound on Wednesday, hitting a two-week high as the wider crypto market seeks a sustained recovery from a weeks-long selloff.】

item.title: 中国初创公司的可重复使用火箭发射后坠毁
item.description: 据中国国家媒体报道，中国一枚部分可重复使用的火箭在发射后坠毁，这表明中国在追逐埃隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 公司所掌握的技术时所面临的挑战。【原文：A partially reusable Chinese rocket crash-landed after launch, according to state media, illustrating the challenges the country faces as it chases the technology mastered by Elon Musk’s SpaceX.】

item.title: 中国在获得新进口配额后扩大伊朗石油进口量
item.description: 在中国政府于上月底发布新一轮进口配额之后，中国的独立炼油企业正在增加从陆上油罐和海上闲置船只中进口伊朗原油的数量。【原文：China’s independent oil refiners are boosting their intake of Iranian crude from onshore tanks and ships idling at sea after Beijing issued a fresh round of import quotas late last month.】

item.title: 万科多名债券持有人表示将反对延期计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，至少有三家本月到期的中国万科公司债券的投资者已向这家陷入困境的开发商发出信号，他们将反对推迟还款的计划。【原文：At least three investors in a China Vanke Co. bond maturing this month have signaled to the embattled developer that they will oppose a plan to delay repayment, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 野村因估值和增长政策上调印尼股票评级
item.description: 野村控股公司将其对印尼股票的建议上调至增持，理由是估值具有吸引力，而且印尼国内政策支持经济增长。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. has raised its recommendation on Indonesian stocks to overweight, citing attractive valuations and a domestic policy that’s supportive of growth.】

item.title: 波兰将因通胀疲软再次降息
item.description: 波兰央行很可能在今年第六次降息，因为通胀放缓幅度超过预期，低于决策者的目标。【原文：Poland’s central bank is likely to deliver its sixth interest-rate cut this year after inflation slowed more than expected, slipping below policymakers’ target.】

item.title: 丹斯克认为瑞典央行将于 2026 年底提高利率以抵御通胀
item.description: 丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）的经济学家加入了对瑞典央行政策前景持最鹰派预测的行列，他们现在预计，经济增长加快和通胀率上升将促使瑞典央行在明年下半年开始加息。【原文：Economists at Danske Bank A/S are joining the most hawkish forecasters on the policy outlook for Sweden’s central bank, now expecting that faster growth and a rising inflation rate will prompt the Riksbank to start raising interest rates already late next year.】

item.title: 中国石化业蓬勃发展加剧全球供应过剩担忧
item.description: 中国新建石化厂的浪潮正引发人们对大量出口的担忧，这将给已经在供过于求中挣扎的其他生产国带来压力。【原文：A wave of new Chinese petrochemical plants is raising fears of a deluge of exports that will put pressure on other producing nations that are already struggling with oversupply.】

item.title: 印尼限制首次公开募股订单规模以抑制股价波动
item.description: 印度尼西亚监管机构对投资者在首次公开发行股票时可购买的股票数量设置了限制，以抑制价格波动。【原文：Indonesia’s regulator has set a limit on how many shares investors can buy during initial public offerings in an effort to curb price volatility.】

item.title: 英国和日本引领全球政府退出长期债券销售
item.description: 英国和日本正在顺应投资者的需求，增加短期借贷，这种战略转变为政府提供了较低的利息支付，但在债务展期时，政府可能会面临代价高昂的利率波动。【原文：The UK and Japan are responding to investor demand to boost short-term borrowing, a shift in strategy that offers governments lower interest payments but exposes them to potentially costly rates swings at the time of debt rollovers.】

item.title: 李在镕增持三星C&T股份，三星C&T股价大涨，刺激对公司治理的押注
item.description: 三星 C&T 公司股价飙升至历史新高，因为李在镕增持公司股份的消息刺激了投资者对三星集团控股权可能发生重大变化的乐观情绪。【原文：Samsung C&T Corp. shares surged to a record high as news that Jay Y. Lee is increasing his stake in the company spurred investor optimism over possible key changes in Samsung group holdings.】

item.title: 史泰博在中期选举中大获全胜
item.description:
特朗普需要帮助低收入选民，这可能会带来买入机会。【原文：

Trump’s need to help lower-paid voters may propel a buying opportunity.

】

item.title: 泰国连续通货紧缩和致命洪灾给降息带来压力
item.description: 泰国的消费价格连续第八个月下降，加大了央行今年第四次下调政策利率的压力。【原文：Thailand’s consumer prices fell for the eighth straight month, heightening pressure on the central bank to cut its policy rate for a fourth time this year.】

item.title: 贸易僵局拖累印度卢比跌破每美元 90 卢比
item.description: 印度卢比周三跌破了 1 美元兑 90 卢比的关键心理价位，原因是与美国达成关键贸易协议的延迟继续影响市场情绪。【原文：India’s rupee slipped past the key psychological level of 90 per dollar on Wednesday, as delays in concluding a crucial trade deal with the US continue to dent sentiment.】

item.title: 报道称日法官员确认政策合作
item.description: 据日本媒体报道，在埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）访华之前，一位日本高级国家安全官员与一位法国外交政策顾问确认，两国将为实现自由开放的印度洋-太平洋地区而合作。【原文：A senior Japanese national security official confirmed with a French foreign policy adviser that both nations would cooperate toward realizing a free and open Indo-Pacific, ahead of Emmanuel Macron’s visit to China, according to Japanese media reports.】

item.title: 法国艾文斯公司推出 2 亿英镑双渠道银团贷款
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，法国车队管理和汽车租赁公司 Ayvens SA 正在推销一笔 2 亿英镑（2.64 亿美元）的双币种子弹头贷款。【原文：Ayvens SA, a French fleet managing and car leasing company, is marketing a £200m ($264m) dual-tranche bullet loan, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西芒杜首艘船驶往中国，铁矿石市场开始震荡
item.description: 来自几内亚一个大型新矿的首批商业铁矿石正在运往中国的途中，这标志着全球炼钢材料供应开始发生重大转变。【原文：The first commercial shipment of iron ore from a massive new mine in Guinea is on its way to China, marking the start of a major shift in global supply of the steelmaking material.】

item.title: 随着贸易恢复，多批美国大豆将运往中国
item.description: 彭博社看到的一份船货清单显示，在贸易协定为向中国发货开辟道路之后，多批美国大豆正准备运往中国。【原文：Several US soybean cargoes are being prepared for China, according to a ship lineup seen by Bloomberg, after a trade pact opened the way for shipments to the Asian nation.】

item.title: 交易员关注印度央行是否会出人意料地降息
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 上海审查社交媒体上谈论房地产市场的帖子
item.description: 上海当局正在审查那些对房地产市场持悲观态度的社交媒体帖子，这凸显了这个金融中心的监管机构为遏制日益加深的房地产危机所采取的措施。【原文：Shanghai authorities are censoring social media posts that express a pessimistic outlook on the housing market, underscoring the lengths regulators in the financial hub are taking to stem the deepening property crisis.】

item.title: 中国万科空头押注创十年新高，债券延期引发愤怒情绪
item.description: 在香港，对中国万科的看跌押注攀升至十年来的新高，因为投资者押注该开发商的股价将在其令人震惊的债券延迟支付后继续下行。【原文：Bearish bets on China Vanke Co. climbed to a decade high in Hong Kong as investors wagered that the downward spiral in the developer’s shares will extend following its shock bond payment delay.】

item.title: 中国服务业活动再次放缓，显示经济疲软
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国服务业活动的扩张速度为五个月来最弱，这进一步证明了消费需求疲软，给正在放缓的经济带来了更大压力。【原文：China’s services activity expanded at the weakest pace in five months, a private survey showed, adding more evidence of sluggish consumer demand that’s putting further pressure on a slowing economy.】

item.title: 印度称在遭到反弹后可删除强制性手机应用程序
item.description: 印度试图消除人们对其在手机上预装网络安全应用程序的任务可能会侵犯隐私或使监控成为可能的担忧，称个人可以从设备上删除该软件。【原文：India sought to address concerns that its mandate to pre-install a cybersecurity app on mobile phones could invade privacy or enable surveillance, saying individuals can remove the software from devices.】

item.title: 美巢启动 6.03 亿美元印度首次公开募股的投资者订单
item.description: 由软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）支持的印度电子商务公司 Meesho Ltd. 周三开始接受首次公开募股订单，募集资金可能高达 542 亿卢比（约合 6.03 亿美元）。【原文：Meesho Ltd., an Indian e-commerce firm backed by SoftBank Group Corp., started taking orders Wednesday for an initial public offering that may raise as much as 54.2 billion rupees ($603 million).】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会叫停高杠杆 ETF 计划，发出风险警告
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会已向美国一些最活跃的交易所交易基金提供商发出了大量警告信，有效阻止了旨在提供两到三倍于股票、大宗商品和加密货币日回报率的产品的推出。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission has issued a flurry of warning letters to some of the country’s most prolific providers of high-octane exchange-traded funds, effectively blocking the introduction of products designed to deliver two or three times the daily returns of stocks, commodities and cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 出口下滑，马来西亚棕榈储备量创六年新高
item.description: 一项调查显示，由于 11 月份出口下降，马来西亚的棕榈油库存飙升至六年多来的最高水平。【原文：Palm oil stockpiles in Malaysia surged to the highest in more than six years as exports dropped in November, according to a survey.】

item.title: Ashmore 价值 23 亿美元的基金经理依靠印度职业女性推动业绩增长
item.description: 拉希-塔尔瓦-巴蒂亚（Rashi Talwar Bhatia）说，印度劳动力中女性人数的不断增加让她想起了 20 世纪 60 年代美国的女权运动。【原文：Rashi Talwar Bhatia says the growing presence of women in India’s workforce reminds her of the feminist movement seen in the US in the 1960s.】

item.title: 欧盟敲定到 2027 年逐步停止进口俄罗斯天然气的协议
item.description: 欧盟已达成一项协议，将在 2027 年前逐步淘汰俄罗斯的天然气，这是欧盟就莫斯科入侵乌克兰一事向其施加压力的最新举措。【原文：The European Union has reached a deal to phase out Russian natural gas by 2027, the latest move to ratchet up pressure on Moscow over its invasion of Ukraine.】
